name: Ineedadrink
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i need a drink
des:
Staying sober is hard. 

When you say “Alexa, I need a Drink”, this skill will provide you with prayer, mediations and encouragement to get you back on the straight and narrow.

Add “Alexa, I need a Drink” to your daily routines and Alexa will check in with you every day to support you staying off the bottle.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
